item.description:
Please join us for a fun night @ the movies. Come see that all the BUZZ is about.

We are planning on seeing the 7:00 pm show, so let's meet around 6:30 pm. This way we have a little time to socialize before we have to head into the theater and can sit together as well.

They are currently showing it at 7:00 pm, but please check back on Monday in case the movie time changes over the weekend.

http://www.fandango.c...

If you would like further detail on the movies, just follow this link.
http://www.fandango.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Near the ticket booth, look for the TFS sign.
item.name: Movie Night - Twilight Saga; New Moon
